mapper.select: SELECT idx, writer, memo, to_char( post_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') post_date from memo where ${search_option} like '%'|| #{search} ||'%' order by idx desc
select idx, writer, memo, to_char(post_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') post_date from memo where writer like '%' || #{search} || '%' or memo like '%' || #{search} || '%' order by idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into memo (idx, writer, memo) values ((select nvl(max(idx)+1,1) from memo), #{writer}, #{memo})
mapper.update: update memo set writer=#{writer}, memo=#{memo} where idx=#{idx}
